title: With League Being Banned in China Maybe Morde . . . . Wukong . . . . Karma . . . . Malz . . . .
body:
With League of Legends being banned in China maybe:

- Morde will become the undead Queen he was meant to be.
- Wukong can finally get a rework/VGU that really makes us monkey around.
- Maybe Karma will finally come back at these Developers and they give her a proper rework/mini VGU that isn't another numbers buff and old Zilean Soraka abilities.
- Malzahar will get reworked or receive a mini VGU that is out of this world.

BETTER YET! MAYBE THESE DEVELOPERS WILL ACTUALLY START LISTENING TO THEIR CURRENT PLAYERBASE THAT PAYS FOR THE MAJORITY OF THEIR CONTENT AND NOT REVOLVE REWORKS, NERFS, BUFS AND VGU AROUND A COUNTRY THAT IS BASICALLY DISOWNING YOU! Great job catering to the LCS and all of these viewers in China, Riot.

replies.body: I like mord as a spooky ghost in armor tyvm
